projects.name: Python Client for Anytype
projects.description: A Python client library for interacting with the Anytype API
projects.author: charlesneimog

projects.name: Anytype MCP (Semantic Search)
projects.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Anytype that enables semantic search and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) capabilities over your Anytype documents
projects.author: wethegreenpeople

projects.name: Anytype Go SDK
projects.description: A Go SDK for interacting with the Anytype API to manage spaces, objects, and perform searches. This library provides a feature-rich, fluent interface to integrate Anytype functionality into your Go applications
projects.author: epheo

projects.name: Zotero to Anytype
projects.description: Integration between Zotero reference manager and Anytype
projects.author: mattxcnm

projects.name: Anytype Python Client
projects.description: A comprehensive Python client for the Anytype API with both synchronous and asynchronous support
projects.author: beaucronin

projects.name: Anytype Rust Library
projects.description: Rust library for the Anytype API
projects.author: lanesawyer

projects.name: Save to Anytype (Browser Extension)
projects.description: Save important web pages with your selected text in Markdown format to Anytype. Lightweight and easy-to-use alternative web clipper.
projects.author: lazjedi

projects.name: Global Search CLI
projects.description: A command line utility that accesses the Anytype API to provide global (cross-Space) search
projects.author: mowbraym

projects.name: Anytype LangChain Document Loader
projects.description: Load documents from Anytype spaces into LangChain format. Supports sync/async operations with pagination and search.
projects.author: littlehongman
